statements: DELETE FROM training_data WHERE label = 'spam' AND id IN (SELECT trained_data_id FROM model_results WHERE accuracy < 0.7);
DELETE FROM training_data WHERE model_id = 2 AND data_output = 'completed';
DELETE FROM model_history WHERE training_date = '2022-01-15' AND model_id = 1;
DELETE FROM model_metrics WHERE model_id = 3 AND metric_name = 'accuracy'
DELETE FROM Hyperparameters WHERE model_id = 100 AND learning_rate = 0.01;
DELETE FROM TrainingRecord WHERE model_id = 1 AND dataset_id = 1;
